fields.content:
<alert xmlns="urn:oasis:names:tc:emergency:cap:1.2">
  <status>Actual</status>
  <msgType>Update</msgType>
  <scope>Public</scope>
  <note>Example of a message template</note>
  <info>
    <language>hi</language>
    <category>Env</category>
    <event>Test event example</event>
    <responseType>AllClear</responseType>
    <urgency>Expected</urgency>
    <severity>Severe</severity>
    <certainty>Possible</certainty>
    <expiresDurationMinutes>20</expiresDurationMinutes>
    <description>This is a description</description>
    <instruction>This is an instruction</instruction>
   <parameter>
      <valueName>name1</valueName>
      <value>val1</value>
    </parameter>
    <parameter>
      <valueName>name2</valueName>
      <value>val2</value>
    </parameter>
   </info>
</alert>
fields.title: Example of a message template

fields.title: Example of a message template

fields.content:
<alert xmlns="urn:oasis:names:tc:emergency:cap:1.2">
  <status>Actual</status>
  <msgType>Update</msgType>
  <scope>Public</scope>
  <note>Example of a message template</note>
  <info>
    <language>hi</language>
    <category>Env</category>
    <event>Fire event {{ with placeholder }}</event>
    <responseType>AllClear</responseType>
    <urgency>Expected</urgency>
    <severity>Severe</severity>
    <certainty>Possible</certainty>
    <description>This is a description with {{template placeholder}}</description>
    <instruction>This is an instruction with {{template placeholder}}</instruction>
   <parameter>
      <valueName>name1</valueName>
      <value>val1</value>
    </parameter>
    <parameter>
      <valueName>name2</valueName>
      <value>val2</value>
    </parameter>
   </info>
</alert>
fields.title: Example of a message template with placeholder
